name: Orienteering
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the orienteering, which as a sport originated in Scandinavia more than 100 years ago. The coin was issued on the occasion of the World Orienteering Championship held in Kyiv in August 2007.
averseDescription: On the obverse against the glass background there is the Small National Emblem of Ukraine, under which there is the inscription: НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ / БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine), marking of sportsman`s route (on the right), the conventionalized depiction of the compass (on the left), below there is the coin face value - 2 ГРИВНІ (2 Hryvnias), as well as the National Bank of Ukraine Mint logotype.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a running sportsman holding a map in his hand and the inscription: СПОРТИВНЕ (Sport) (horizontal) ОРІЄНТУВАННЯ (Orienteering) (vertical).
